Release the penguins - RStudio Education Blog
The {palmerpenguins} package is now available on CRAN!
It contains two datasets, which are designed to be used for demonstrations of statistical concepts with #Rstats & #Tidyverse tools.
https://t.co/VnAMBiXz04

Big thanks to @hadleywickham. When I whinged on Twitter about #rstats packages and dependencies last night, not only did he engage constructively, he even put in a pull request to fix a problem in someone else's package (the excellent ropenaq) caused by a recent dplyr bug fix.
